title: Steelforged Sword
content:
Steelforged Sword Uncommon 2~7 Damage 1d6 +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Though the grip's leather is old and crusty, it shows no signs of wear, and not a single scratch mars the slender blade. Shortsword Light Finesse 0.9 60

Steelforged Sword

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Though the grip's leather is old and crusty, it shows no signs of wear, and not a single scratch mars the slender blade.

Shortsword Light Fi
